name: Trap Runner (prototype)
description:
Show off your dexterity in Trap Runner, a 1v1 runner set above a futuristic city.

This is still work in progress. Standalone builds for Windows, OSX, Linux are coming.

Controls

Characters move forward automatically.

ActionKeyboard P1Keyboard P2GamepadSlow downA key
Left keyLeft stick / D-pad LeftJumpW keyUp keyA button

Gamepad is supported but you need to press Start once on your gamepad to join the game. We recommend doing this during the 3-2-1 countdown to avoid wasting time during the race.

■日本語


近未来都市の上空に設置された1v1ランナーゲーム。 様々なトラップを潜り抜けて、ゴールを目指せ！

このゲームはプロトタイプ版です。 Windows、OSX、Linux用のスタンドアローンビルドが予定されています。
